lexUnit.name: recurring.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: occurring with a regular periodicity.

sentence.text: The endless repetition strikes one as inexorable , like a recurring dream .
Some sound had penetrated her dream -- an unpleasant recurring dream .

The Egyptians regarded time as a succession of recurring phases .
